snippet: The proposal is a step down from what leaders originally wanted: approval to conduct military operations along Libya’s coast, on land and water, to seize and disrupt smugglers.
abstract: European nations are pushing for United Nations Security Council resolution that will permit their military forces to seize human-smuggling vessels in international waters of Mediterranean Sea.
lead_paragraph: The proposal is a step down from what leaders originally wanted: approval to conduct military operations along Libya’s coast, on land and water, to seize and disrupt smugglers.

headline.main: Europeans Seek to Use Force Against Smugglers at Sea
headline.print_headline: Europeans Seek to Use Force Against Smugglers

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
